title: JavaScript array map
prompt: What is the output of [1, 2, 3].map((n) => n * 2)?

title: HTTP semantics

title: SQL LEFT JOIN
prompt: In a LEFT JOIN, what happens to rows from the left table with no match in the right table?
options: They are removed from the result
They are kept and right-side columns are NULL

title: Complexity

title: Git rebase
prompt: What is the primary goal of git rebase?
options: Replay commits onto another base to keep a linear history
